title: Hackers increasingly abuse Cloudflare Tunnels for stealthy connections
description: Hackers are increasingly abusing the legitimate Cloudflare Tunnels feature to create stealthy HTTPS connections from compromised devices, bypass firewalls, and maintain long-term persistence. [...]

title: Hands on with Windows 11's new modern File Explorer
description: With the introduction of Windows 11 23H2, Microsoft has modernized File Explorer on Windows 11, bringing a fresher look and feel to the system's integral file management tool. [...]

title: Google Play apps with 2.5M installs load ads when screen's off
description: The Google Play store was infiltrated by 43 Android applications with 2.5 million installs that secretly displayed advertisements while a phone's screen was off, running down a device's battery. [...]

title: North Korean hackers 'ScarCruft' breached Russian missile maker
description: The North Korean state-sponsored hacking group ScarCruft has been linked to a cyberattack on the IT infrastructure and email server for NPO Mashinostroyeniya, a Russian space rocket designer and intercontinental ballistic missile engineering organization. [...]
